[DQR.IFRS.0102.9542] Equity with a value of 12,491,638,000 is not equal to the combined total of Stockholders Equity Excluding NI and Noncontrolling Interest ( 12,943,594,000 + 71,634,000 ) with a value of 13,015,228,000.
These values should be equal. The properties of this ifrs-full:Equity fact are: Period :2020-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Decimals of Stockholders Equity Including Noncontrolling Interest : -3 Decimals of Stockholders Equity Excluding NI : -3 Decimals of Noncontrolling Interest : -3

[DQR.IFRS.0102.9542] Equity with a value of 12,974,406,000 is not equal to the combined total of Stockholders Equity Excluding NI and Noncontrolling Interest ( 13,171,806,000 + 69,346,000 ) with a value of 13,241,152,000.
These values should be equal. The properties of this ifrs-full:Equity fact are: Period :2019-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Decimals of Stockholders Equity Including Noncontrolling Interest : -3 Decimals of Stockholders Equity Excluding NI : -3 Decimals of Noncontrolling Interest : -3

[DQR.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of [520000] Statement of cash flows, indirect method but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. sab:AmortizacionInstrumentosPatrimonioPropio, sab:InteresesPagados, sab:SalidaFlujosEfectivoActivosNoCorrientesPasivosClasificadoMantenidosVenta, sab:DividendosPercibidos, sab:InteresesPercibidos All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.
If the item is an additional disclosure in the cash flow statement then make sure that is included as a child of DisclosureOfCashFlowStatementExplanatory or the following abstracts IncomeTaxesPaidRefundAbstract, CashAndCashEquivalentsIfDifferentFromStatementOfFinancialPositionAbstract, DisclosureOfReconciliationOfLiabilitiesArisingFromFinancingActivitiesAbstract, ChangesInLiabilitiesArisingFromFinancingActivitiesAbstract or DisclosureOfReconciliationOfLiabilitiesArisingFromFinancingActivitiesLineItems.
Rule Element Id:9556 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 -

[DQR.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of [220000] Statement of financial position, order of liquidity but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. sab:PromemoriaPasivosFinancierosSubordinadosValorRazonableCambiosResultados, sab:PromemoriaActivosFinancierosMantenidosNegociar, sab:PromemoriaPasivosFinancierosSubordinadosCosteAmortizado, sab:PromemoriaValorRazonableObligatoriamenteValorRazonable, sab:PromemoriaCosteAmortizado, sab:CompromisosPrestamosConcedidos, sab:PromemoriaActivosFinancierosCambiosOtroResultadoGlobal, sab:OtrosCompromisosConcedidos, sab:CedidoArrendamientoOperativo, sab:PromemoriaActivosFinancierosDesignadosValorRazonableCambiosResultados, sab:PromemoriaAdquiridoArrendamiento, sab:GarantiasFinancierasConcedidas All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.
Rule Element Id:9556 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 -

[DQR.IFRS.0129.9604] It is expected that OtherEquityInterest with a value of 0 reported in the network role http://www.esma.europa.eu/xbrl/role/all/ias_1_role-220000_extended should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, Equity with the dimension ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis = ifrs-full:OtherEquityInterestMember and a reported value of 20,273,000 multiplied by 1. This value appears in the network role . This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this ifrs-full:OtherEquityInterest fact are:
Period : 2020-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Decimals of OtherEquityInterest : -3 Decimals of Equity : -3 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/SI5RG2M0WQQLZCXKRM20/2020-12-31/ESEF/ES/0/sab-2020-12-31_.zip/sab-2020-12-31_/reports/sab-2020-12-31.html 39063
